input_messages.content: Summarize why agent evals matter for small teams.

script.content:
- They catch regressions when prompts, tools, or logic change.
- They make failures easier to debug by showing what behavior broke.
- They improve reliability before shipping changes to users.

final_output.content:
- They catch regressions when prompts, tools, or logic change.
- They make failures easier to debug by showing what behavior broke.
- They improve reliability before shipping changes to users.
